meanings.definition: A small book consisting of a few pages
meanings.sent1: I made a booklet about my favorite animals.
meanings.sent2: She handed out a booklet with the rules of the game.
meanings.sent3: The tiny booklet was so cute, it made me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a booklet of memories, each page filled with moments.
meanings.sent5: The booklet was like a treasure chest, holding secrets within its pages.

meanings.definition: A printed piece of paper containing information or instructions
meanings.sent1: He gave me a booklet with all the details for the event.
meanings.sent2: The booklet included a map and directions to the museum.
meanings.sent3: The booklet fluttered in the wind, trying to escape his grasp.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a booklet of happiness, spreading joy to all who saw.
meanings.sent5: The booklet was a beacon of knowledge, guiding us through the project.
